title: Meta patents AI that could continue posting on social media on behalf of deceased users
description: According to the patent document, the LLM can create a "digital clone" of social media users to simulate their online activity, posting messages, photos, and videos on their behalf if they die or take an extended break from social media. It can even interact with other users, respond to DMs,...Read Entire Article

title: When AI casts Tom Cruise
description: ByteDance faces backlash from Hollywood studios and SAG-AFTRA over alleged copyright infringement by its AI video model Seedance 2.0, as the company vows to strengthen safeguards.

title: IT Minister calls next phase of India AI Mission the ‘UPI of AI’
description: Termed as the “UPI of AI,” these solutions will be trusted, tested, and easily accessible via a UPI-type platform, allowing users to build and innovate on top of them

title: State signs Rs468 crore tech MoUs at AI summit; Research park, AI centre planned
description: Bihar has secured ₹468 crore in partnerships aimed at transforming its technology landscape. Key highlights include a ₹250 crore research park set to rise in Patna and a ₹60 crore Centre of Excellence for AI at IIT Bihta.

title: Trump’s Fed pick says AI could push down interest rates soon. Disagreements are already brewing
description: By Bryan Mena, John Towfighi, CNN New York (CNN) — Advances in AI are unlikely to push down interest rates in the short term, a key Federal Reserve official said Tuesday — a stark contrast to Fed Chair nominee Kevin Warsh’s plan for slashing borrowing costs. “I expect that the AI boom is unlikely toThe post Trump’s Fed pick says AI could push down interest rates soon. Disagreements are already brewing appeared first on KTVZ.
